languages.text: "Эта правительница уже имела честь приветствовать Звездорожденного. Сильного, как саблезубый кабан. Ловкого, что лесной джа-гуар. И мудрого, подобно треязыкому змею-хранителю. Смертоносным вихрем ворвался он в леса Кетца Темера, преследуя духов-из-тьмы, что обрушились на мир около трех лун по десять ночей назад".

traits.locale_text: "Эта правительница уже имела честь приветствовать Звездорожденного. Сильного, как саблезубый кабан. Ловкого, что лесной джа-гуар. И мудрого, подобно треязыкому змею-хранителю. Смертоносным вихрем ворвался он в леса Кетца-аль Хета, преследуя духов-из-тьмы, что обрушились на мир около трех лун по десять ночей назад".

languages.text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."
languages.original_text: "Эта правительница уже имела честь приветствовать Звездорожденного. Сильного, как саблезубый кабан. Ловкого, что лесной джа-гуар. И мудрого, подобно треязыкому змею-хранителю. Смертоносным вихрем ворвался он в леса Кетца Темера, преследуя духов-из-тьмы, что обрушились на мир около трех лун по десять ночей назад".

traits.locale_text: "This ruler had already hat the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest ja-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into the Quetza Temer forest, chasing the spirits from the darkness that had descended upon the world about three moon ago, ten days in each."

"This ruler had already hat the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest ja-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into the Quetza Temer forest, chasing the spirits from the darkness that had descended upon the world about three moon ago, ten days in each."

"This ruler had already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jaguar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into the Quetza Temer forest, chasing the spirits from the darkness that had descended upon the world about three moons ago, ten days in each."

"This ruler had already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jaguar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into the Quetza Temer forest, chasing the spirits from the darkness that had descended upon the world about three moons ago, ten days in each."

"This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

"This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

languages.text: «Esta jefa ya había tenido el honor de recibir a otro Hijo de las Estrellas: tan fuerte como un jabalí dientes de sable, tan ágil como un jha-guar del bosque y tan sabio como la serpiente guardiana de lengua trífida. Irrumpió en el bosque de Quetza Temer como un torbellino, persiguiendo a los espíritus de las tinieblas que descendieron a este mundo hará unas tres lunas de diez días cada una».
languages.original_text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

traits.locale_text: «Esta jefa ya había tenido el honor de recibir a otro Hijo de las Estrellas: tan fuerte como un jabalí dientes de sable, tan ágil como un jaguar del bosque y tan sabio como la serpiente guardiana de lengua trífida. Irrumpió en el bosque de Quetza Temer como un torbellino, persiguiendo a los espíritus de las tinieblas que descendieron a este mundo hará unas tres lunas de diez días cada una».

languages.text: “此酋长已经有幸接待过一位星裔。他强壮如剑齿野猪，敏捷如丛林猎豹，智慧如三舌守护蛇。他如同旋风般冲进了格扎尔特默的森林，追逐着三个月前降临在这个世界的黑暗精魂。在这个世界里，一个月为十个日落。”
languages.original_text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

traits.locale_text: “此酋长已经有幸接待过一位星裔。他强壮如剑齿野猪，敏捷如森林猛虎，智慧如三舌守护蛇。他如同旋风般冲进了格扎尔特默的森林，追逐着三个月前降临在这个世界的黑暗精魂。在这个世界里，一个月为十个日落。”

languages.text: « Cette dirigeante a déjà eu l'honneur d'accueillir un Stellaire aussi fort qu'un sanglier à dents de sabre, aussi agile qu'un jha-guar sylvestre et aussi sage que le serpent gardien à trois langues. Tel un tourbillon, il s'est précipité dans la forêt de Quetza Temer à la poursuite des esprits des ténèbres qui sont arrivés dans ce monde il y a trois lunes de dix jours. »
languages.original_text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

traits.locale_text: « Cette dirigeante a déjà eu l'honneur d'accueillir un Stellaire aussi fort qu'un sanglier à dents de sabre, aussi agile qu'un jaguar sylvestre et aussi sage que le serpent gardien à trois langues. Tel un tourbillon, il s'est précipité dans la forêt de Quetza Temer à la poursuite des esprits des ténèbres qui sont arrivés dans ce monde il y a trois lunes de dix jours chacune. »

languages.text: 「この支配者は、スターボーンを迎えるという栄誉をすでに得ておりますれば。イノシシのように強く、森のジャガーのように身軽で、3本の舌を持つ守護蛇のように賢い。旋風のように、彼はケツァ・テメルの森に突撃し、3つ月ほど前に世界に降り注いだ暗闇よりの精霊を、それぞれ10日間ずつ追いかけております」
languages.original_text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

traits.locale_text: 「この支配者は、スターボーンを迎えるという栄誉をすでに得ておりますれば。イノシシのように強く、森のジャガーのように身軽で、3本の舌を持つ守護蛇のように賢い。旋風のように、彼はケツァ・テメルの森に突撃し、3つ月ほど前に世界に降り注いだ暗闇よりの精霊を、それぞれ10日間ずつ追いかけております」

languages.text: "Diese Herrscherin hatte bereits die Ehre, einen Sternengeborenen zu begrüßen. So stark wie ein Säbelzahneber, so wendig wie ein Wald-Jha-guar, und so weise wie die dreizüngige Wächterschlange. Wie ein Wirbelwind ist er in den Wald von Quetza Temer gestürmt, hat die Geister-aus-der-Dunkelheit vertrieben, die drei Zehn-Tage-Monde zuvor über diese Welt hereingefallen waren."
languages.original_text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Herrscherin hatte bereits die Ehre, einen Sternengeborenen zu begrüßen. So stark wie ein Säbelzahneber, so wendig wie ein Waldjaguar, und so weise wie die dreizüngige Wächterschlange. Wie ein Wirbelwind ist er den Wald von Quetza Temer gestürmt, hat die Geister aus der Dunkelheit vertrieben, die vor etwa drei Monden über diese Welt hereingefallen waren, zehn Tage jeweils."

languages.text: "Kılıç dişli boğa kadar güçlü, orman ca-guarı kadar atik ve üç dilli muhafız yılan kadar bilge olan bir Yıldızdoğan'ı karşılamanın onuru hâlihazırda bu hükümdara bahşedildi. O Yıldızdoğan ki âdeta bir kasırga gibi Quetza Temer ormanına hücum etti ve on ay günü önce dünyaya inen karanlıktan gelen ruhların peşine düştü."
languages.original_text: "This ruler has already had the honour to greet a Starborn: as strong as a sabre-tooth boar, as nimble as a forest jha-guar, and as wise as the three-tongued guardian snake. Like a whirlwind, he charged into Quetza Temer's forest, chasing the spirits-from-the-darkness that had descended upon the world three ten-day moons before."
